name: Take Care.N
description:
Take Care.N is a singleplayer game where you play as a shop keeper while being chased by a wild Karen. throw objects to stun her and avoid being hit by her deadly screams. the cops have already been called so just hold out until they arrive.

Features:

  • 1 store map
  • 1 Wild Karen
  • 200+ throwable objects to ruin her day

The team:

Quinn Roosenburg [Level - UI]

Daan Lötgerink [Audio - UI - Functionality]

Damian de Vries [Modelling - VFX - Functionality]

Sander Vestjens [Lighting - AI - Functionality]

Notes from the team:

We jumped into the Extra Credits Game jam #6 with the intention to improve ourselves and get more experience for our portfolio. Surprisingly we got done what we wanted to do with a normal amount of sleep. (which doesn't happen often during a game jam) We had a lot of fun on this and hopefully, you will have fun playing it.

Disclaimer:

All characters appearing in this work are fictitious. No identification with actual persons (living or deceased), places, buildings, and products is intended or should be inferred.
